title:
Spin 1 field in the Lobachevsky space H_{3}: horospherical coordinates,
  exact solutions

title_detail.value:
Spin 1 field in the Lobachevsky space H_{3}: horospherical coordinates,
  exact solutions

summary:
A complete system of solutions for a field with spin 1 in the space of
constant negative curvature, Lobachevsky space H_{3}, has been constructed. The
treatment is based on 10-dimensional Duffin-Kemmer formalism extended to curved
model according to tetrad method by Tetrode-Weyl-Fock-Ivanenko, and specified
in horospherical coordinates. The solving procedure substantially uses a
generalized helicity operator. The Lobachevsky geometry acts along z axis as a
medium with simple reflecting properties. Restriction to massless case is
performed as well.

E.M. Ovsiyuk1

SPIN 1 FIELD IN THE LOBACHEVSKY SPACE H3 :
HOROSPHERICAL COORDINATES, EXACT SOLUTIONS
Mozyr State Pedagogical University named after I.P. Shamyakin, Belarus
Abstract
A complete system of solutions for a field with spin 1 in the space
of constant negative curvature, Lobachevsky space H3 , has been constructed. The treatment is based on 10-dimensional Duffin–Kemmer
formalism extended to curved model according to tetrad method by
Tetrode–Weyl–Fock–Ivanenko, and specified in horospherical coordinates. The solving procedure substantially uses a generalized helicity
operator. The Lobachevsky geometry acts along z axis as a medium
with simple reflecting properties. Restriction to massless case is performed as well.

The main task of the article is to construct a complete system of solutions for a field with spin 1 (massive and massless cases) in the space
of constant negative curvature Lobachevsky space H3 ; treatment is based
on 10-dimensional Duffin–Kemmer formalism extended to curved model according to tetrad method by Tetrode–Weyl–Fock–Ivanenko (see in [1]). The
